TextField

Text Field objects accept text input from end users.

First name:
Last name:

TextArea

TextArea objects accept large amounts of text input from end users.

RadioButton

Radiobutton objects allow users to select items that are mutually exclusive.

Male
Female

CheckBox

CheckBox objects allow users to select several items in a list.

I have a bike
I have a car

Button

Button objects allow users to trigger some action by clicking on the button.

Link

Link objects allow users to trigger some action by clicking on the Link object.

Visit our HTML tutorial

ListBox

ListBox objects allow users to select an item from a list of items.

Table

Table objects display information within a contained column and row based structure.

Jill Smith 50
Eve Jackson 94
